QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_ArealStratumBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Quantity measures associated to areal stratum such as in a geotechnical slice. Uncertainty is documented in Pset_Uncertainty.

QtoDef.Name: Area
QtoDef.Definition:
Calculated area for the object.
Area represented, if lower edge of stratum known.

QtoDef.Name: Length
QtoDef.Definition:
The length of the object.
Of upper edge of slice.

QtoDef.Name: PlanLength
QtoDef.Definition: Projected plan length of upper edge of slice.
